page.title: 07COTTON FACTORY (cont)
page.content: There are 2 other British sites. The shifts;6.30am-14.30,14.15-22.15 and 22.00_6.30am.The changes of shifts causes severe traffic problems on Huddersfield Road. We thought that exports maybe a problem;They have some problems with Sri Lanka,and changes in the value of sterling,{normally they {deal in the dollar(U.S.)}They have markets in upholstrey,bedding,pillows underfelt and material for inside cars.(FORD MOTORS). {Home Customers.}Mainly big supermarkets,e.g ASDA,HILLARDS, GRATTONS CATALOGUES. Also bedding companies e.g. SILENTNIGHT. {Foreign Customers}include Singapore, Saudi Arabia,Ireland and other European Countries. Cottons employ many Asians in their firm none of whom live in Battyeford or Mirfield.
